ygData.subject: Re: Research and Rune I
ygData.msgSnippet: Rune is sort of like the enchanter version of a hit point buff.  It gives you invulnerability for a certain amount of damage.  I have read that Rune 1 is about
ygData.messageBody:
Rune is sort of like the enchanter version of a hit point buff. It
gives you invulnerability for a certain amount of damage. I have read
that Rune 1 is about 125 points of damage. It will generally last
until you have been hit for that amount, and then disappears. When it
disappears You start taking normal damage instead of the blow being
absorbed by your magical shield. It also seems to go away after a long
while if you take no damage at all. I use Rune anytime I'm in new
territory or I'm doing something risky. If your group's healer has run
out of mana you can cast rune on your tank to keep him alive a bit
longer.

First spells for reserach require left and right halves of pages 23, 24
and 26, respectively. Put each matched pair in the Tome of Endlesss
Enchantments and combine.

--- Jim F <jimf@...> wrote:
> Well,
>
> After almost hitting the delete character key(thank
> god I didn't), I finally made it to level 16.
>
> I just have a few questions,
>
> When is the Rune 1 spell really worth using? I cast
> it on myself and it lasted an incredibly long time
> Just wandering around. I cast it a second time and
> as soon as I got into any fighting it wore off very
> fast. Kind of an expensive spell for the time it
> lasts. Just looking for some feedback and maybe some
> situations to use it.
>
>
> Second question is about research. What book to I
> need to buy? and for the first three spells is there
> a left and right half to one page? or do I just put
> one page in ?
>
> Zahlhedren The Beatle Hunter
> Finally 16 in North Karana
>
